name: Kick It California (Quit Smoking Helpline)
description: Kick It California is the state's free quit smoking and tobacco helpline, offering personalized coaching, a mobile app, and resources to help Californians quit tobacco, vaping, and marijuana.
fullDescription: Kick It California is the state's free quit smoking and tobacco helpline, offering personalized coaching, a mobile app, and resources to help Californians quit tobacco, vaping, and marijuana.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free one-on-one phone coaching
- Personalized quit plan
- Mobile app for tracking progress
- Text and email support
- Resources for quitting vaping
- Marijuana coaching (ages 13-29)
- Available in English, Spanish, Chinese, Korean, Vietnamese
- Free nicotine patches (while supplies last)
howToGetIt: Call 1-800-300-8086 or visit kickitca.org to get started. Coaching is free, confidential, and available in multiple languages. You can also enroll through the mobile app.
